phrases: But I still want to dance
Someday, one day my passion's fire will
One day the flames would die out
Hey, I thought I did not need anything
But even now, I am so serious
I still have time to make it
Ah... but I am going to burn it up, baby
Sorry darling, it is not that easy
But surely it is not that bad either
I am going to burn it up, yeah
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
Sorry darling Hurry up Ah... I still have time to make it
I am going to burn it up, yeah
4 The story of the cursed sword
He cannot hear a word you are saying.
Been standing there for half an hour now.
He is as wet as a drowned rat.
He can catch a cold for all I care.
I think he is listening to the rain.
I told you, he cannot hear.
You are from a rich family, are not ya?
Pretty words and a ladylike face.
You are not some country girl.
I am right, are not I?
I am just another peddler now.
Hey, what were you praying so hard about just now?
I was praying that my brother would come home soon.
If it is been that long, he is probably already...
Why did you run off like that?
How could anyone do such a thing?
Dammit, why the hell did you do this?
This sword was thirsty for blood.
It is alive, a cursed sword that drinks human blood.
Once you have it in your hands,
it controls your body to kill anyone alive.
So you are blaming that sword for all this?
There is a demon in that blade.
But it is not as quick as mine.
I am so glad, you have come to.
I prayed so hard for so long.
That you would come home safely.
It will come back to me anyway.
Dang it, I do not want to go that way.
There is danger in these woods...
To fight is a samurai's duty.
Father and Mother will look over us.
I will not be gone long.
They were selling this out on the street.
You have always liked it, have not you?
Remember how when I was a child, I would never stop crying once I got started?
No matter how much Mother tried, I would keep crying and crying.
And when that happened, you would come to me.
I would stop crying just like that.
And I would sit there and gaze at the crane.
He has built quite a magnificent castle for me.
Not even a great army could conquer it easily.
But if he double crosses us, he could expose its weaknesses.
It would be less secure than a sandcastle.
We must kill him before that happens.
Then take your own life with this sword.
That is an old sword that had been stored away.
Just right for you, do not you think?
That sword is said to become sharper as it soaks in more blood.
Of course, it is only a rumor.
But there is enough blood here to find out.
It is me, cannot you tell?
I could not defend the house nor the land on my own.
But with you here with me, we could live again like before...
I do not care if you are not the same anymore.
Why did you let me live?
before I got Nihiru back in my hands.
We searched everywhere, but could not find the midwife.
Our footsteps admonish indifference in such verbose ways
As I peek into your fathomless eyes, I lose my composure
Is there any hope in the place I am heading to?
because this road is so dark
I will be there to shine the light
I am used to playing at saying goodbye,
but I cried when I waved to you
Our fiery woes fade... and fade...
If I knew tomorrow would be so mundane,
I would not have said that I wanted to live
I know it is futile but cannot help dreaming of a future... a future... you are to blame
